description: This capsular module comprising of 4 sub-modules is designed to introduce students to clinically-relevant neuroscience topics. Major topics to be covered in : 1) Neurodegenerative diseases 2) Neuropsychiatric and other brain disorders 3) CNS injuries and repair and 4) Pharmacotherapy for nervous system dysfunction
faculty: NUS Graduate Sch for Int Science and Engineering
title: Brain Disorders & Repair
